title: Biden Misstates How His Son Beau Died in 2nd Verbal Fumble in Florida
description: The president confused the American war in Iraq with the Russian war in Ukraine and then misstated how his son Beau died.
dc:creator: Peter Baker
media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:description: President Biden misspoke twice during a rally for Democratic candidates in Hallandale Beach, Fla., on Tuesday.
